target.generate: SCHEMA: person(ssn, surname, name, boss) INSTANCE: person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "Walter", boss: "Boss1") person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "Walter", boss: "Boss2") person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "Walzer", boss: "Boss4") person(ssn: "123", surname: "Smith", name: "Joxn", boss: "Boss5")

scenario.dependencies: ExtEGDs: // Person[ssn] -> Person[name] fd0: person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname1, name: $name1, boss: $boss1), person(ssn: $ssn, surname: $surname2, name: $name2, boss: $boss2) -> $name1 == $name2.
